snippet.title: Cosmic Pioneer Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description: Cosmic Pioneer is a simple and fun game, no amazing cut-scenes, no grand intro just gameplay. The game is made as an omage to the old arcade game Moon Lander. If you like the game concept please support us on Steam Greenlight
